item.title: Hunt Companies Acquisition Corp. I S-1
item.description: Hunt Companies Acquisition Corp. item.title: About SEC Form Visualizer
item.description: The goal for this website it to visualize SEC forms in fun way. It is built using Hugo and a custom template. The data is scraped, cleaned, and visualized utilizing Python. Currently it parses and creates visualizations for 10-K and S-1 filled with the SEC. It makes use of a variety of open source projects and data including: SEC Form Data Hugo Learn more about my projects on GitHub.
